title: Disease

description.plain:
‘Disease’ is the second single from Lady Gaga’s 7th album, MAYHEM.

The song was initially teased when one song from each of her albums on the streaming platform Spotify was updated to have an anagram formed by lowercase letters, spelling out the word “Disease”.

Gaga officially announced the song on October 21st with a photo teaser and global release schedules.

embed_content: Read “Disease” by Lady Gaga on Genius

‘Disease’ is the second single from Lady Gaga’s 7th album, MAYHEM.

The song was initially teased when one song from each of her albums on the streaming platform Spotify was updated to have an anagram formed by lowercase letters, spelling out the word “Disease”.
